item.description:
Since the Improv Jones show isn't until 10PM tonight, let's get together before the show!

Blake's Tavern is a couple of blocks from the theater and has food if you're up for a late dinner. As I recall, they have a decent sized back room which we may be able to commandeer. Come anytime between 7:30 and 9:30. We'll walk to the Perishable Theater from here around 9:30

If you have trouble finding us, you can reach me at 781-864-1181

Matt
item.how_to_find_us: Look for the tall guy with glasses...or call me...
item.name: Pre Improv Jones Meetup
